description: Try our easy to follow Roast beef with Spinach Pocket recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast beef,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Spinach
name: Roast beef with Spinach Pocket Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg baby chat potatoes (heated gravy to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a pocket in one side of the beef and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Trim stems from spinach and place in a bowl. Pour over boiling water to cover and leave until wilted. Drain well, squeeze out excess water and chop.
Combine spinach with feta and pine nuts and fill pocket. Tie beef with kitchen string.
Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a metal baking pan. Add beef and brown well on all sides over high heat to seal.
Transfer pan to oven and cook for 20 minutes. Reduce heat to 180°C and cook for a further 30 to 40 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Remove pan from oven, cover meat with foil and rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Meanwhile, cook potatoes by tossing potato halves with remaining oil in a separate baking pan. Sprinkle with sea salt. Cook for 30 minutes until golden.
Serve with potatoes and heated gravy, if desired.
